name: Haunted Hop
description:
Ever had a time where you were playing video games and your family got in the way of the fun? Ever wanted to play a game about it? Well too bad, because in Haunted Hop you not only have to dodge ghosts but you  have to deal with your pesky family getting in the way of you playing your game! How long can you survive?

Game Design, Programming, and Voice Overs By Kustaa

* https://twitter.com/KustaaGames

Art For Annoying People Popping Up In Front of your Game by FunkyRot  * https://twitter.com/Funky_Rot
